h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Celestial Lotus Seeds Location
content: There are a large variety of Soaks to be found throughout the game, across each chapter. For even more guides on these areas, check out our full Black Myth: Wukong walkthrough. You can also keep track of the Awaken Wine Worm locations and Luoija Fragrant Vine locations, which are key to upgrading your healing potential and Gourd.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Lotus_Seeds.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Lotus Seeds', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Celestial Lotus Seeds Location'.
The content is as follows:
There are a large variety of Soaks to be found throughout the game, across each chapter. For even more guides on these areas, check out our full Black Myth: Wukong walkthrough. You can also keep track of the Awaken Wine Worm locations and Luoija Fragrant Vine locations, which are key to upgrading your healing potential and Gourd.
